Service Details: - Provides emergency medical services 24 hours a day, seven days a week- Responds to 911 calls, delivers treatment at the scene and transport to the hospital- Provides highly specialized, pre-hospital and inter-facility treatment and transport- Oversees a comprehensive aviation program- Participates in disaster management and preparedness initiatives to ensure efficient and timely disaster response- Works to provide real time technical information to on-site supervisors and crews who respond to Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear and Explosive (CBRNE) events- Provides inter-facility patient transfers and high-risk infant transport- Offers contracted paramedic services at major public and international events, professional sporting events, movie sets and community fairs
